skill_e.tooltip: Fiora gains 50/60/70/80/90% attack speed for her next two attacks. The first attack cannot critically strike, but will apply a 30% slow for 1 second. The second attack is guaranteed to critically strike for ?% damage (?).

skill_i.tooltip: Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.

skill_q.tooltip:
Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing 70/80/90/100/110 (+0.6) physical damage and applying on-hit effects. This attack prioritizes Vitals and enemies it will kill.

If this ability hits an enemy, 50% of its cooldown is refunded.

skill_r.tooltip:
Fiora reveals all four Vitals on target champion, for a potential ? max health true damage. In addition, Fiora gains Duelist's Dance's movement speed bonus (?%) while near the target.

If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals in ? seconds or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed for ? each second for between ? to ? seconds, scaling with the amount of Vitals hit.

skill_w.tooltip:
Fiora parries all incoming damage, debuffs, and disables for the next 0.75 seconds and then stabs in the target direction.

The stab deals 110/150/190/230/270 (+?) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and slows their movement and attack speed by 50% for 2 seconds.

If Fiora parries an immobilizing effect, Riposte stuns instead of slowing.
